function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of abundant and common OTUs in dust samples","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and cleaning of dust-prone areas","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C light disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management, cleaning service providers"},{"Description":"Variation in bacterial communities between different architectural spaces","Impact":"Potential for different spaces to harbor different disease vectors and contaminants","Mitigation":"Regular sampling and analysis of bacterial communities, targeted cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Environmental DNA sequencing, remote monitoring systems","People":"Architects, building managers, cleaning staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management, environmental monitoring companies"},{"Description":"Distinct bacterial composition in restrooms","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen presence in restrooms and potential for cross-contamination","Mitigation":"Enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols for restrooms","Technologies":"Automated disinfection systems, touchless fixtures","People":"Restroom users, cleaning staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management, cleaning service providers"}]}
